hero.title: Precision Engineering for
hero.subtitle: OEM supplier for shock absorbers and suspension components. Trusted by industry leaders like Tenneco and Hitachi.

products.title: Engineered Suspension Systems
products.subtitle: High-performance components manufactured to strict OEM tolerances.

quality.title: Zero Defect Policy
quality.desc: Our manufacturing process adheres to the strictest automotive standards.
quality.cert_text: We are fully certified for automotive production. Our quality management system ensures continuous improvement.

history.title: Our Legacy
history.subtitle: From humble beginnings to a global OEM partner.

steps.title: Passed Marelli Audit
steps.desc: Began supplying components to major European automotive manufacturers.

steps.title: Passed Hitachi Astemo Audit
steps.desc: Began supplying components to major Japanese automotive manufacturers.

steps.title: Passed BWI Audit
steps.desc: Began supplying components to major European automotive manufacturers.

steps.title: Relocated to New Plant
steps.desc: Expanded facility to 18,000 sqm with state-of-the-art manufacturing technology.

steps.title: Obtained IATF 16949 Certificate
steps.desc: Implemented a quality management system compliant with international standards.

steps.title: Passed KYB Audit
steps.desc: Began supplying components to major Japanese automotive manufacturers.

steps.title: Passed Tenneco Audit
steps.desc: Signed long-term supply agreement for next-gen adaptive suspension systems.

steps.title: Company Founded
steps.desc: Started as a specialized component manufacturer in Zhejiang Province.

contact.label: Get in Touch
contact.title: Ready to discuss your OEM requirements?
contact.desc: Our engineering team is ready to assist with technical specifications, prototyping, and mass production schedules.
contact.security: Your data is secure. We adhere to strict NDA protocols.

footer.desc: Leading manufacturer of automotive suspension systems. Dedicated to quality, precision, and global standards since 1994.
